data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 63,400 people living in Marinduque, Philippines. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Marinduque, Philippines
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 48,841 people in the state of Marinduque who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 7 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Marinduque, Philippines the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Marinduque, Philippines to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the South Asian, general people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the South Asian, general people.
Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 63,400 souls in Marinduque and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Marinduque
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.section_summary:
the state of Marinduque, Philippines has a population of 63,400.

We estimate Marinduque has 8,831 people who might know Jesus, 48,841 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 5,728 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Marinduque.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.
